name: Slimes vs Robot
description:
Get the highest possible score

Slimes vs Robot is an arena arcade game. You have to kill as many enemies as possible without getting hit ! Bonuses will be there to help you in your mission.

In this game you play as the last robot that stands against the slimes, good luck!

The game can be played with keybord (azerty) and mouse. Left click for regular shots and right click to use bonuses.

First game made in gameJam #VGLgamejam
